se350.elevatorSim.build

Interface Floor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FloorImpl

    public interface Floor
    Interface representing the behavior of a Floor. So far it just defines adding a person to the floor and getting the story of it.
    Author:
    Shahzaib Syed

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPeopleToElevator(Elevator e)
      Adds all people on this floor that want to go in the direction of the elevator to said elevator.
      void addPerson(Person person)
      Adds a person implementation to the floor.
      int getStory()
      Get the height/id of the floor.
      void pressControlBox(int direction)
      Method that simulates a Person pressing a ControlBox on whatever Floor they are on in their desired direction.

    • Method Detail

      • addPerson

        void addPerson(Person person)
        Adds a person implementation to the floor.
        Parameters:
        person - - Person to add to the floor

      • addPeopleToElevator

        void addPeopleToElevator(Elevator e)
                         throws InvalidParameterException
        Adds all people on this floor that want to go in the direction of the elevator to said elevator.
        Parameters:
        e - - The elevator to add people to if they want to go in the same direction
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - if input data is invalid - specified by error message

      • getStory

        int getStory()
        Get the height/id of the floor. The story of the building which it represents.
        Returns:
        The story for the building which the Floor represents.

      • pressControlBox

        void pressControlBox(int direction)
                     throws InvalidParameterException
        Method that simulates a Person pressing a ControlBox on whatever Floor they are on in their desired direction.
        Parameters:
        direction - - The direction the Person wants to go
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - if input data is invalid - specified by error message
